rows.label: qst104302_msg001
rows.name: Welcome! Hm? You're a new face.

rows.label: qst104302_msg002
rows.name:
Well, I don't turn away first-timers,
so I won't kick you out.

rows.label: qst104302_msg003
rows.name:
Alright then, let's get
down to business. First,
let me check your rank.

rows.label: qst104302_msg004
rows.name:
Why so quiet all of a sudden?
What? You don't know about ranks?

rows.label: qst104302_msg005
rows.name:
You came here without even
knowing that?! Sorry, but I
can't negotiate a sale then.

rows.label: qst104302_msg006
rows.name:
Can't say this too loud, but
my shop can only be used by
certain ranked salvagers.

rows.label: qst104302_msg007
rows.name:
If you want to sell salvaged
goods, first go to Avaritia
and get yourself ranked.

rows.label: qst104302_msg008
rows.name:
This shop is only for salvagers
of the highest rank.

rows.label: qst104302_msg009
rows.name:
When you reach that rank
and come back, I'll treat
you as a proper customer.

rows.label: qst104302_msg101
rows.name:
What, you haven't reached
the highest rank yet?

rows.label: qst104302_msg102
rows.name:
If you want to deal with me, rank
up first. We can talk after that.

rows.label: qst104302_msg201
rows.name: Welcome! Oh, it's you!

rows.label: qst104302_msg202
rows.name: So, did you reach the highest rank?

rows.label: qst104302_msg203
rows.name:
Well then, you're a customer!
So? What do you want to sell?

rows.label: qst104302_msg204
rows.name:
...Hmm, this one. It's in pretty good
shape. I'll buy it for 12,000G!

rows.label: qst104302_msg205
rows.name:
What, no need to be so surprised.
Who salvaged it is also a factor
that raises an item's value.

rows.label: qst104302_msg206
rows.name:
So with that, I'll be taking
this off your hands.

rows.label: qst104302_msg207
rows.name: No, no, thank you.

rows.label: qst104302_msg208
rows.name:
If you salvage anything else you
want to sell, bring it to my shop.

rows.label: qst104302_msg301
rows.name: Did you find anything new?
